attributes.action: impose harsher penalties on celebrities who are repeatedly caught abusing drugs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Celebrities flout the law by repeatedly abusing drugs. Despite being caught, often with mountains of evidence stacked against them, the penalties received are often lax. Celebrities are looked up to by societies youth and a bad example is being set, that drugs are cool and you no real punishment will be handed down. Celebs who break the law should be treated the same as any other member of public, ie when tried for possession of a class A drug, they should be given a prison sentence.
